content.text: Calculate how much tax Mukhtar paid last year
Calculate how much Mukhtar earned each month after tax had been paid
Mukhtar has \(\) 1500$ to invest in one of the following ways
● **Account A** paying **simple** interest at a rate of \(4.1\%\) per year
● **Account B** paying **compound** interest at a rate of \(3.3\%\) per year
Which account will be worth more after **3 years** and by how much?
He did not pay tax on \(\)5500$ of his earnings
He paid \(24\%\) tax on his remaining earnings
Use the cosine rule to calculate angle \(ABD\)
The ramp is a prism of width 4m
Calculate the volume of this prism
The diagram shows the cross section, \(ABCD\), of a ramp
Write as a single fraction in its simplest form
The volume of the wedge of cheese is \(90\mathrm{cm}^3\)
Show that the value of \(h\) is \(3.84 \mathrm{cm}\) correct to 2 decimal places
Calculate the total surface area of the wedge of cheese
A mathematically similar wedge of cheese has a volume of \(22.5 \mathrm{cm}^3\)
Calculate the height of this wedge
A wedge of cheese in the shape of a prism is cut from a cylinder of cheese of height \(h\) cm
The radius of the cylinder, \(OA\), is \(8\mathrm{cm}\) and the angle \(AOB = 42^\circ\)
Complete the table of values for \(y = \frac{2}{x^2} - \frac{1}{x} - 3x\)
Draw the graph of \(y = \frac{2}{x^2} - \frac{1}{x} - 3x\) for \(-3 \leqslant x \leqslant -0.3\) and \(0.3 \leqslant x \leqslant 3\)
Use your graph to solve these equations
By drawing a suitable straight line on the graph, solve the equation \(\frac{2}{x^{2}} -\frac{1}{x} -3x = 10 - 3x.\)
The equation \(\frac{2}{x^{2}} -\frac{1}{x} -3x = 10 - 3x\) can be written in the form \(ax^{2} + bx + c = 0\) where \(a, b\) and \(c\) are integers
Find the values of \(a, b\) and \(c\)

two letters that are the same

do not include a letter E,
include exactly two letters that are the same
Prettie now picks a third card at random

Prettie picks a card at random from the 11 cards above and does not replace it
She then picks a second card at random and does not replace it
At what time does Noma arrive in Hong Kong?
Noma sleeps for part of the journey
The time that she spends sleeping is given by the ratio
Calculate how long Noma sleeps during the journey
Give your answer in hours and minutes
The distance from Hong Kong to Johannesburg is 10 712 km
The time taken for the journey is 13 hours and 25 minutes
Calculate the average speed of the plane for this journey
The plane uses fuel at the rate of 1 litre for every 59 metres travelled
Calculate the number of litres of fuel used for the journey from Johannesburg to Hong Kong. Give your answer in standard form
The cost of Noma's journey is 10 148 South African Rand (R)
This is an increase of \(18\%\) on the cost of the journey one year ago
Calculate the cost of the same journey one year ago
Noma flies from Johannesburg to Hong Kong
Her plane leaves Johannesburg at 18:45 and arrives in Hong Kong 13 hours and 25 minutes later
The local time in Hong Kong is 6 hours ahead of the time in Johannesburg
Show all your working and give your answers correct to 2 decimal places
Describe fully the single transformation that maps triangle \(A\) onto
the rotation of triangle \(A\) about (6, 0) through \(90^{\circ}\) clockwise,
the enlargement of triangle \(A\) by scale factor \(- 2\) with centre (0, \(- 1\) ),
the shear of triangle \(A\) by shear factor \(- 2\) with the \(y\)-axis invariant
Find the matrix that represents the transformation in part (b)(iii)

The first row has been completed for you
